paragraphs: PC! I must leave for the Intergalactic Congress Reunion today. Have you seen my briefcase with the categorized galaxies?
It's right here, Professor! You have finally classified them all!
That's right! You know, these are very important. Ever since the formation of the Intergalactic Congress there has been a great amount of conflicts, and these should resolve them all!

Each galaxy is represented by their type, and every galaxy type has the right to one vote when it comes to deciding the fate of the universe. But there has been some discussion regarding the number of votes each galaxy type should receive!
So, I was put in charge to classify every single galaxy, so the Congress can determine how many votes each type of galaxy should get, bringing peace to the whole universe!
That must've been a lot of work!
It sure was. I hope I don't lose them, it's my only copy!
